params:
ctx
x
y
w
h
padding

4.text:
x0 = x - w - add
x1 = x0 + padding
x3 = x + w + add
x2 = x3 - padding
top = y - h
bottom = y + h

3.text:
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(x0, y)
ctx.lineTo(x1, top)
ctx.lineTo(x2, top)
ctx.lineTo(x3, y)
ctx.lineTo(x3, bottom)
ctx.lineTo(x0, bottom)
ctx.closePath()

name: buildLoopBeginPath
